verses.verse: Hear <WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the LORD,<WH3068> ye children<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> for<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> hath a controversy<WH7379> with<WH5973> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land,<WH776> because<WH3588> there is no<WH369> truth,<WH571> nor<WH369> mercy,<WH2617> nor<WH369> knowledge<WH1847> of God<WH430> in the land.<WH776>
By swearing,<WH422> and lying,<WH3584> and killing,<WH7523> and stealing,<WH1589> and committing adultery,<WH5003> they break out,<WH6555> and blood<WH1818> toucheth<WH5060> blood.<WH1818>

Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> shall the land<WH776> mourn,<WH56> and every one<WH3605> that dwelleth<WH3427> therein shall languish,<WH535> with the beasts<WH2416> of the field,<WH7704> and with the fowls<WH5775> of heaven;<WH8064> yea, the fishes<WH1709> of the sea<WH3220> also<WH1571> shall be taken away.<WH622>
Yet <WH389> let no<WH408> man<WH376> strive,<WH7378> nor<WH408> reprove<WH3198> another:<WH376> for thy people<WH5971> are as they that strive<WH7378> with the priest.<WH3548>
Therefore shalt thou fall<WH3782> in the day,<WH3117> and the prophet<WH5030> also<WH1571> shall fall<WH3782> with<WH5973> thee in the night,<WH3915> and I will destroy<WH1820> thy mother.<WH517>

My people<WH5971> are destroyed<WH1820> for lack<WH4480> <WH1097> of knowledge:<WH1847> because<WH3588> thou<WH859> hast rejected<WH3988> knowledge,<WH1847> I will also reject<WH3988> thee, that thou shalt be no priest<WH4480> <WH3547> to me: seeing thou hast forgotten<WH7911> the law<WH8451> of thy God,<WH430> I<WH589> will also<WH1571> forget<WH7911> thy children.<WH1121>
As they were increased,<WH7231> so<WH3651> they sinned<WH2398> against me: therefore will I change<WH4171> their glory<WH3519> into shame.<WH7036>
They eat up<WH398> the sin<WH2403> of my people,<WH5971> and they set<WH5375> their heart<WH5315> on<WH413> their iniquity.<WH5771>
And there shall be,<WH1961> like people,<WH5971> like priest:<WH3548> and I will punish<WH6485> <WH5921> them for their ways,<WH1870> and reward<WH7725> them their doings.<WH4611>

For they shall eat,<WH398> and not<WH3808> have enough:<WH7646> they shall commit whoredom,<WH2181> and shall not<WH3808> increase:<WH6555> because<WH3588> they have left off<WH5800> to take heed<WH8104> <WH853> to the LORD.<WH3068>
Whoredom <WH2184> and wine<WH3196> and new wine<WH8492> take away<WH3947> the heart.<WH3820>

My people<WH5971> ask counsel<WH7592> at their stocks,<WH6086> and their staff<WH4731> declareth<WH5046> unto them: for<WH3588> the spirit<WH7307> of whoredoms<WH2183> hath caused them to err,<WH8582> and they have gone a whoring<WH2181> from under<WH4480> <WH8478> their God.<WH430>

They sacrifice<WH2076> upon<WH5921> the tops<WH7218> of the mountains,<WH2022> and burn incense<WH6999> upon<WH5921> the hills,<WH1389> under<WH8478> oaks<WH437> and poplars<WH3839> and elms,<WH424> because<WH3588> the shadow<WH6738> thereof is good:<WH2896> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> your daughters<WH1323> shall commit whoredom,<WH2181> and your spouses<WH3618> shall commit adultery.<WH5003>

I will not<WH3808> punish<WH6485> <WH5921> your daughters<WH1323> when<WH3588> they commit whoredom,<WH2181> nor your spouses<WH3618> when<WH3588> they commit adultery:<WH5003> for<WH3588> themselves<WH1992> are separated<WH6504> with<WH5973> whores,<WH2181> and they sacrifice<WH2076> with<WH5973> harlots:<WH6948> therefore the people<WH5971> that doth not<WH3808> understand<WH995> shall fall.<WH3832>

Though <WH518> thou,<WH859> Israel,<WH3478> play the harlot,<WH2181> yet let not<WH408> Judah<WH3063> offend;<WH816> and come<WH935> not<WH408> ye unto Gilgal,<WH1537> neither<WH408> go ye up<WH5927> to Beth-aven,<WH1007> nor<WH408> swear,<WH7650> The LORD<WH3068> liveth.<WH2416>
For <WH3588> Israel<WH3478> slideth back<WH5637> as a backsliding<WH5637> heifer:<WH6510> now<WH6258> the LORD<WH3068> will feed<WH7462> them as a lamb<WH3532> in a large place.<WH4800>
Ephraim <WH669> is joined<WH2266> to idols:<WH6091> let him alone.<WH5117>
Their drink<WH5435> is sour:<WH5493> they have committed whoredom continually:<WH2181> <WH2181> her rulers<WH4043> with shame<WH7036> do love,<WH157> Give<WH3051> ye.
The wind<WH7307> hath bound her up<WH6887> <WH853> in her wings,<WH3671> and they shall be ashamed<WH954> because of their sacrifices.<WH4480> <WH2077>
